QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Apolipoprotein CII
QAPair.Answer: Apolipoprotein CII (apoCII) is a protein found in large fat particles that the gastrointestinal tract absorbs. It is also found in very low density lipoprotein ( VLDL ), which is made up of mostly triglycerides (a type of fat in your blood). This article discusses the test used to check for apoCII in a sample of your blood.
